abstract: Xu Xiang was detained in a police operation last year that involved sealing off the 22-mile Hangzhou Bay Bridge, one of the world’s longest.
snippet: Xu Xiang was detained in a police operation last year that involved sealing off the 22-mile Hangzhou Bay Bridge, one of the world’s longest.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — One of China’s best-known financiers, sometimes called his country’s equivalent to Carl C. Icahn, has pleaded guilty to insider trading and stock price manipulation, in a case that forms part of a broader nationwide push against financial improprieties.

headline.main: Top Chinese Financier Pleads Guilty to Insider Trading
headline.print_headline: Star Investor in China Pleads Guilty to Misdeeds
